snippet.title: Man exposes himself to Sydney schoolgirls
snippet.content: A man riding an electric scooter has exposed himself twice to two young girls as they played at their school in Sydney's east. The man was riding past the school on The Avenue at Randwick on Wednesday afternoon when flashed the girls, aged 7 and 8. Police are searching for a man wearing an orange high-visibility shirt and riding a black and silver electric scooter with thick tyres. Originally published as
